title: RD CDM Data Model
description: The ontology-based Rare Disease Common Data Model (RD CDM) to enable international registry use, HL7 FHIR, and GA4GH Phenopackets. This version defines the structure of RD CDM v2.0.0.

version.description: The version of the data model

metadata.description: Metadata about the data model, such as author, creation date, and ontologies used

author.description: Name of the author of the data model

ontologies.description: A list of ontologies used in the data model

ontologyName.description: The name of the ontology (e.g., SNOMED CT, LOINC)

version.description: The version of the ontology being used

url.description: The URL or reference to the ontology source

dataElements.description: A list of data elements in the model

section.description: The section of the data element

elementName.description: The name of the data element

elementCode.description: The code associated with the data element

elementCodeSystem.description: The terminology used for the data element (e.g., SNOMED CT, LOINC)

dataType.description: The data type of the element (e.g., string, integer, boolean)

dataSpecification.description: Specification or format for the data element

conceptCodeSystem.description: Code system associated with the concept (e.g., SNOMED CT, LOINC)

fhirExpression.description: FHIR v4.0.1 expression for this data element

phenopacketSchemaElement.description: GA4GH Phenopacket Schema v2.0 element for this data element

description.description: Detailed description of the data element
